title: Fairly heavy showers expected in parts of the island
byline: The Meteorology Department states that showers or thundershowers will occur at several places in the Central, Sabaragamuwa, Uva, and Eastern provinces, as well as in the Polonnaruwa, Hambantota, and Mullaittivu districts during the afternoon or night.

title: Easter celebrations begin around the world
byline: The celebration of Easter, one of the great holidays for Christian believers, has begun around the world.

title: “The pain remains, and so does our responsibility,” PM Harini reflects on Easter
byline: As Christians across Sri Lanka and around the world observe Easter Sunday, Prime Minister Dr. Harini Amarasuriya extended her heartfelt wishes to the Christian community, highlighting the season as one of spiritual renewal, compassion, and shared humanity.

title: Third day of “Siri Dalada Wandanawa” to begin today in Kandy
byline: The special exposition of the Sacred Tooth Relic, Siri Dalada Wandanawa, is scheduled to commence today for the third consecutive day at the Temple of the Sacred Tooth Relic in Kandy, this afternoon (20).

title: Thousands of protesters rally against Trump across US
byline: Thousands of protesters rallied in Washington and other cities across the U.S. on Saturday to voice their opposition to President Donald Trump‘s policies on deportations, government firings, and the wars in Gaza and Ukraine.

title: Brazilian nabbed at BIA with cocaine worth around Rs. 240 million
byline: A Brazilian national has been arrested by the Narcotics Control Unit at Bandaranaike International Airport (BIA) while attempting to smuggle nearly 5 kilograms of cocaine, valued at around Rs. 240 million, Ada Derana reporter said.

title: Health officials warn of increased risk of Dengue and Chikungunya
byline: Health officials warn that the ongoing rains have increased the risk of dengue and chikungunya spreading.

title: Two more arrested over alleged assassination plot targeting businessman ‘Gampaha Osman’
byline: Two more suspects have been arrested by the Special Task Force (STF) in connection with an alleged assassination plot targeting a businessman in the Gampaha area, known as ‘Gampaha Osman Gunasekara,’ as well as several others.
